00118     public function registerClientScripts( $autoLocateScript = false )
00119     {
00120         //  Additional scripts, let dad load them.
00121         if ( is_array( $this->_scriptFiles ) )
00122         {
00123             foreach ( $this->_scriptFiles as $_scriptFile )
00124                 $this->pushScriptFile( $_scriptFile );
00125         }
00126

00129         {
00130             $_yiiBase = PS::_gbu();

00132

00226     protected function generateJavascript( $targetSelector = null, $options = null, $insertBeforeOptions = null )
00227     {
00228         //  Fix up the button image if wanted
00229         if ( $this->widgetName == 'datepicker' && $this->hasOption( 'buttonImage' ) && $this->buttonImage === true )
00230             $this->buttonImage = $this->getExternalLibraryUrl() . '/jqui/js/images/calendar.gif';
00231 
00232         $_widgetMethodName = PS::nvl( $this->widgetMethodName, $this->widgetName );
00233 
00234         //  Get the options...
00235         $_options = ( null !== $options ? $options : $this->makePublicOptions() );
00236         $_targetSelector = $this->getTargetSelector( $targetSelector );
00237         $_scriptId = 'jQuery' . ( null !== $_targetSelector ? "('{$_targetSelector}')" : '' );
00238 
00239         //  Jam something in front of options?
00240         if ( null !== $insertBeforeOptions )
00241         {
00242             $_staticOptions = $insertBeforeOptions;
00243             if ( ! empty( $_options ) ) $_staticOptions .= ", {$_options}";
00244             $_options = $_staticOptions;
00245         }
00246 
00247         $this->script =<<<CODE
00248 {$_scriptId}.{$_widgetMethodName}({$_options});
00249 CODE;
00250 
00251         return $this->script;
00252     }
00253 
00262     protected function getTargetSelector( $targetSelector = null )
00263     {
00264         $_scriptId = null;
00265 
00266         //  Get the target. Passed in class overrides all...
00267         if ( null != $targetSelector )
00268         {
00269             //  Add a period if one is not there, assume it's a class...
00270             if ( $targetSelector[0] != '.' && $targetSelector != '#' ) $targetSelector = ".{$targetSelector}";
00271             $_scriptId = $targetSelector;
00272         }
00273         else
00274         {
00275             //  Do we have a target element?
00276             if ( $this->hasOption( 'target' ) && $this->target == '_NONE_' )
00277                 $_scriptId = null;
00278             else if ( ! empty( $this->target ) )
00279                 $_scriptId = $this->target;
00280             else
00281                 $_scriptId = "#{$this->id}";
00282         }
00283 
00284         //  Return the selector
00285         return $_scriptId;
00286     }

00303     public static function create( $name = null, array $options = array() )
00304     {
00305         //  Instantiate...
00306         $_class = PS::o( $options, 'class', __CLASS__, true );
00307         $_widget = new $_class();
00308 
00309         //  Set default options...
00310         $_widget->widgetName = $name;
00311         $_widget->target = PS::o( $options, 'target', null, true );
00312         $_widget->id = $_widget->name = PS::o( $options, 'id', $name );
00313         $_widget->name = PS::o( $options, 'name', $_widget->id );
00314 
00315         if ( PS::o( $options, 'naked', ( $_class == __CLASS__ ) ) )
00316         {
00317             $_widget->locateScript = true;
00318             $_widget->autoRegister = true;
00319         }
00320 
00321         return $_widget->finalizeCreate( $options );
00322     }
00323 
00333     protected function finalizeCreate( $options = array() )
00334     {
00335         //  Initialize the widget
00336         $this->init();
00337 
00338         //  Set variable options...
00339         if ( is_array( $options ) )
00340         {
00341             $_baseUrl = $this->baseUrl;
00342 
00343             //  Check for scripts...
00344             foreach ( PS::o( $options, '_scripts', array(), true ) as $_scriptFile )
00345                 $this->registerWidgetScript( $_scriptFile );
00346 
00347             //  Check for scripts...
00348             foreach ( PS::o( $options, '_scriptFiles', array(), true ) as $_scriptFile )
00349                 $this->pushScriptFile( $_baseUrl . $_scriptFile );
00350 
00351             //  Check for css...
00352             foreach ( PS::o( $options, '_cssFiles', array(), true ) as $_cssFile )
00353                 $this->pushCssFile( $_baseUrl . $_cssFile );
00354 
00355             //  Now process the rest of the options...
00356             foreach ( $options as $_key => $_value )
00357                 $this->addOption( $_key, $_value );
00358         }
00359 
00360         //  Does user want us to run it?
00361         if ( $this->autoRun )
00362             $this->run();
00363 
00364         //  And return...
00365         return $this;
00366     }
